channel.title: Snickerscape? maybe its in "BETA"
channel.description:
i decided to kickstart my server after a 7 year hiatus (because so many people were asking for it i know guys) (thats sarcasm)
anyway its nothing special i literally just got a source and im going to start making it my own kind of the original source is Pkplanet Link to the source: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,419547.0.html (as of right now all credits to them because im a lazy arse)
(source is liable to change down the road if i cant do anything with the existing one but i highly doubt that will happen especially if players really start to get on here which i also doubt)
anyway if you would like to join i changed the IP in ths client to better reflect the server im running heres the link to that download LINK TO CLIENT: http://up.ht/1BZeGTF
feel free to join

item.title: Snickerscape? maybe its in "BETA"
item.dc:creator: @cookkris cookkris
item.description:
@cookkris wrote:

[quote=“stCky, post:2, topic:549285”][quote author=cookkris link=topic=668186.msg4468736#msg4468736 date=1421725900]
i decided to kickstart my server
[/quote]

woULD YOU say you decided to…SNICKERSTART your server? A HEH![/quote] haha yes i guess i did

but honestly its just to EAT UP some time
